data.title: Madirazza & Partners > Dispute resolution > Croatia
data.text: Noted for its standout arbitration and litigation offering, Madirazza & Partners acts for banks and other financial institutions, as well as clients in the energy and real estate sectors. Founding and managing partner Josip Madirazza handles a wide range of litigation and administrative cases, while co-lead Ivan Madirazza focuses on real estate litigation and construction disputes, representing developers, lenders and private equity firms. The firm’s broad practice covers troubled PPP, disputes related to performance of obligation and corporate mandates arising from shareholder disputes. Specialising in enforcement proceedings and debt collection, Dunja Zakošek is another key name to note.
